Class javax.speech.recognition.ResultAdapter 

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--javax.speech.recognition.ResultAdapter
public class ResultAdapter
extends Object
implements ResultListener
The adapter which receives events for a Result object. The methods in this class are empty; this class is provided as a convenience for easily creating listeners by extending this class and overriding only the methods of interest.

Method Summary
void audioReleased(ResultEvent e)
          A AUDIO_RELEASED event has occured.
